system.description: Effect: If Golden Fist is used at least once in combat, the user rolls a Simple Accounting Skill Check. On a success, the user (or their Trainer, if they're an owned Pokemon), gains +1 to their Resources Skill. Every 3 DoS confers +1 additonal increase to Resources.
